-   [covdata R Package](https://kjhealy.github.io/covdata/)

-   Data Science Central [Big data sets available for free](https://www.datasciencecentral.com/profiles/blogs/big-data-sets-available-for-free)

-   Economic Innovation Group [Distressed Communities Index](https://eig.org/dci)

-   [Eviction Lab](https://evictionlab.org/get-the-data/) data on residential evictions summarized to various administrative geographies

-   [Global Human Settlements Dataset](http://www.statsmapsnpix.com/2016/10/the-global-human-settlement-layer.html?m=1)

-   HUD [Location Affordability Index](https://www.hudexchange.info/programs/location-affordability-index/)

-   HUD [Urbanization Perceptions Small Area Index](https://www.huduser.gov/portal/AHS-neighborhood-description-study-2017.html#small-area-tab)

-   HUD [USPS Vacancy Data](https://www.huduser.gov/portal/datasets/usps.html)

-   [Longitudinal Tract Database (LTDB)](https://s4.ad.brown.edu/projects/diversity/researcher/bridging.htm): 1970 - 2010 Census data normalized to 2010 census tracts

-   MIT Senseable Cities Lab [Treepedia](http://senseable.mit.edu/treepedia/)

-   [National Housing Preservation Database (NHPD)](https://preservationdatabase.org/about-the-database/)

-   Policy Surveillance Program [Eviction Laws database](https://lawatlas.org/datasets/eviction-laws-1530797420)

-   USDA [Rural-Urban Commuting Area Codes](https://www.ers.usda.gov/data-products/rural-urban-commuting-area-codes.aspx)

-   [Stanford Open Policing Project](https://openpolicing.stanford.edu/)

-   SURGO Foundation [U.S. COVID Community Vulnerability Index (CCVI)](https://precisionforcovid.org/ccvi)
